SEARCH
Package sparta.clack.cipher

Class CharacterCipher

java.lang.Object
sparta.clack.cipher.CharacterCipher
Direct Known Subclasses:
CaesarCipher, VignereCipher
public abstract class CharacterCipher extends Object
Abstract class for ciphers that work on character data.

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • group

      public static String group(String str, int n)
      Return a copy of a string, but reformatted into groups of n non-whitespace characters, with groups separated by a space. The last group may have fewer than n characters.
      Parameters:
      str - the string to break into groups
      n - how many characters in each group
      Returns:
      the grouped version of the argument string

    • shift

      public static char shift(char c, int n)
      Returns the character that is n letters further on in ALPHABET, with wrap around at the end of ALPHABET. Negative values are allowed and cause a shift to the left. A shift of 0 returns the original character.
      Parameters:
      c - the character to shift.
      n - the number of places to shift the character.
      Returns:
      the character at the location n places beyond c.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if c is not in ALPHABET.

    • shift

      public static String shift(String str, int n)
      Returns the string resulting from shifting each character of str by n places.
      Parameters:
      str - the string to shift.
      n - the amount to shift each letter.
      Returns:
      the shifted version of str.
